resources.string: In this example, when you type in something in the text field below, what you entered will be displayed in a list underneath it. You\'ll end up with a list of all queries you\'ve entered.\nAn entry will be considered only when a certain timespan will have passed when you\'re typing.
This example resolves the equation "Ax + B = 0". When you enter the values of "A" and "B", the resulting value of "X" is instantaneously displayed underneath them.
